textBox.richText: This is why you should always tell your family and friends that you love them.

This is my random post for the week, only to explain my delay in posting the Toronto job experience... but also to share a valuable lesson I learned about appreciating and loving those closest to you. The only thing we are guaranteed in life is death... so realizing that in a crazy situation motivated me to share this story with you.  Promise me you will give your family a big hug, or send them a loving message. <3
